templates.name: Is signature required for upon delivery?
templates.content:
For orders containing spritz or cocktails, yes, a signature of someone 21+ with valid ID is required at the time of delivery. If you miss the delivery, and the order is returned to our warehouse, you will have the option to:

1. Have your order resent, but incur additional return + re-shipping fees.
2. Receive a refund, minus return + shipping fees.

templates.name: What is the difference between your Spritzer and hard seltzer ?
templates.content:
Our spritz is our own take an aperol spritz. An elevated cocktail that you can just crack open the can and enjoy. (6% abv) We use a propriety orange wine for our spritz. It's sweetened with real fruit juices. 

Our sparkling hard teas are packed with flavor and no sugar. At zero sugar and 90 calories or less, you can enjoy these to sip on all day long. Sugar beer based (gluten free, no malt). 4.2% ABV Our cocktails are the most decadent drinks. There are 2 cocktails per can. We use the same proprietary orange wine. 12% abv.
